title: 'GM Street’ — Bill Simmons and the Trade Deadline (Ep. 173)
description:
The Ringer's Michael Lombardi and Tate Frazier join up with Bill Simmons to break down the Patriots parting ways with Jimmy Garoppolo (02:00), whether the Buffalo Bills are the best in the AFC East (23:15), the problems in Carolina (37:00), the Texans shipping out Duane Brown (42:00), how the 49ers landed Jerry Rice (45:00), the mess in Miami (49:30), and the success of the Eagles (59:30).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
